report:
**Damage Report:**

**Vehicle Make/Model:** [Insert Vehicle Information]
**Date of Inspection:** [Insert Date]

---

**Location of Damage:**
- The damage is located on the driver's side rear door of the vehicle.

**Type of Damage:**
- The damage appears to be a scratch or scrape along the lower portion of the rear door. The scratch is linear and extends horizontally across the door panel.
- There is also some peeling paint visible near the scratch, indicating that the paint has been damaged and is starting to come off.

**Additional Notes:**
- The scratch seems to have occurred recently as the surrounding area of the door does not show signs of rust or further deterioration.
- The damage is localized and does not appear to extend into the body panels above or below the affected area.

**Conclusion:**
The vehicle has sustained damage to the driver's side rear door, specifically a scratch with some associated paint damage. This damage can be repaired through standard auto body repair techniques.

---

[Your Name]
